title: Miley Cyrus and Demi Lovato get spooky and lead stars at Universal Studios Halloween Horror Nights
text:
With just one weekend left until the spook-tacular Halloween holiday, Miley Cyrus and Demi Lovato were among the many celebs spotted at Universal Studios Halloween Horror Nights.

The 26 year old singer was spotted with fashion designer Jeremy Scott while posing around several monsters at the event on Saturday.

She also shared other photos with boyfriend Cody Simpson and other friends surrounded by gruesome monsters at the event.

Miley's scares: With just one weekend left until the spook-tacular Halloween holiday, Miley Cyrus and Demi Lovato were among the many celebs spotted at Universal Studios Halloween Horror Nights

Cyrus was wearing a white sweater with a black printed design that appears to be a jack-o-lantern of some kind.

She also wore black pants and black shoes with a black hat, as she posed with her friends and the costumed creatures.

Aside from Cyrus, Scott and Simpson, there were no shortage of celebs at the Universal Studios attraction this past weekend.

Spooky friends: She also shared other photos with boyfriend Cody Simpson and other friends surrounded by gruesome monsters at the event

Demi Lovato was also another celeb in attendance, surrounded by chainsaw-wielding ghouls.

The singer/actress was wearing a pink shirt under a two-tone blue Balenciaga windbreaker.

She had her jet black hair tied back with large gold hoop earrings and black pants for her Halloween Horror Nights outing.

Demi's look: Demi Lovato was also another celeb in attendance, surrounded by chainsaw-wielding ghouls

Singer Jessie J was also spotted at the attraction, though she wasn't seen with her beau, Channing Tatum.

The singer was wearing a mesh black top and a black bra under a black coat with a black and white striped hat.

She was also wearing grey pants for her outing at the annual Universal Studios event, which runs through November 3.

Jessie J sighting: Singer Jessie J was also spotted at the attraction, though she wasn't seen with her beau, Channing Tatum

Teen pop star Billie Eilish was also spotted at the event, rocking a black hoodie with bright green hair.

Grown-Ish star Trevor Jackson was rocking a pink hoodie with an orange stocking cap and grey sweats.

Wilmer Valderamma rocked a black hoodie while having a fake chainsaw put to his throat while Manny Jacinto smiled alongside some ghouls.

Sailor Brinkley-Cook, just off of her elimination from Dancing With the Stars, was spotted getting spooked in a tie-dyed hoodie and jeans.

Actress Bella Thorne rocked a black coat with red trim and black pants for her Halloween Horror Nights outing.

Billie's look: Teen pop star Billie Eilish was also spotted at the event, rocking a black hoodie with bright green hair

Scared stiff: Grown-Ish star Trevor Jackson was rocking a pink hoodie with an orange stocking cap and grey sweats

Wilmer and Manny: Wilmer Valderamma rocked a black hoodie while having a fake chainsaw put to his throat while Manny Jacinto smiled alongside some ghouls

Sailor's spooked: Sailor Brinkley-Cook, just off of her elimination from Dancing With the Stars, was spotted getting spooked in a tie-dyed hoodie and jeans

Outing: Actress Bella Thorne rocked a black coat with red trim and black pants for her Halloween Horror Nights outing

Skai: Skai Jackson rocked a red hoodie while smiling alongside Horror Nights actors
description: With just one weekend left until the spook-tacular Halloween holiday, Miley Cyrus and Demi Lovato were among the many celebs spotted at Universal Studios Halloween Horror Nights.
